page.title: 04KENNETH MCKEE - A BIOGRAPHY
page.content:
God has had a profound influence on my life & work.It began at Bethlehem on Christmas Eve 1945 when I was in the RAMC.In the Church of the Holy Nativity (at the entrance to the cave where Christ was born) I was arrested by a wonderful feeling.I seemed to glow inwardly.My over_riding feeling was one of joy at having received the Holy Spirit of God.
{As an Orthopaedic Surgeon}I thought of mechanical replacements for diseased and injured joints.About 1940 I bought out my first prototypes using chrome cobalt (a new metal alloy). 1951 saw my first 3 total hip replacements at the Norfolk & Norwich Hospital. 1953-1963 I carried out a series of 27 cases,the first series of such a size ever carried out.
